summary:
## The International: Dota 2's Big Tournament

The International is the biggest tournament for the video game Dota 2. 20 teams from around the world compete for a huge prize, which is funded by players buying special in-game items. It's been held every year since 2011, first in Germany and then mostly in Seattle, with recent events returning to international locations. The prize money is often over $40 million, making it the richest single esports tournament. Team Liquid are the current champions.
title: The International (esports)
